trends: There has been one other sighting in West Islip
There were no other sightings in West Islip on or around September 13th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsWent outside to close my car windows and noticed a light in the sky changing in brightness. I went and got some binoculars and saw a bright light with 3 dimmer lights on both sides of it. It changed brightness when the craft rotated about 45 degrees. Then rotated back. I've been watching it for an hour now and it's still there at 11:45. I live on Long Island NY and it's to my south west at about 45 degrees up. I wish I had a telescope to see it better.
Summary: Looked in the SW and saw a light changing in brightness & got binoculars to see a bright light with several dimmer lights on either side.
